description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: Kami Chi no Kyuuseishu -0.00000001% o Hikiate Saikyou e-

altTitles.ja: 神血の救世主〜0.00000001%を引き当て最強へ〜

altTitles.en: Savior of Divine Blood: Draw Out 0.00000001% to Become the Strongest

description.en: A player who can fight creatures from the wonders of another world. The main protagonist, Ariake Subaru, was bullied and was chosen as a player of the “Rainbow” rank, which is neither gold, silver, nor copper. He acquired the skill to freely manipulate blood, and his life and position changed completely. As he continues to fight every day, he gradually earns the title as a “Savior” who will save the world.
description.ja: 異界からの脅威に対抗する超人的存在"プレイヤー"。イジメられっ子の透晴は、既存の金・銀・銅のどれでもない、"虹"ランクのプレイヤーに選ばれる。それまでの立ち位置から一変、世界を救う"救世主"となる！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

altTitles.vi: Ponta nhà tôi bỗng dưng hóa thành người?!

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.
description.vi: Một ngày đẹp trời bỗng dưng toàn bộ chó trong một thị trấn nọ hóa thành người...Và cô nàng Saki phải sống(vật lộn) với một bé Husky hóa thành trai đẹp XD

title.en: Hiota no Kanojo ga Ore no Motteru Eroge ni Kyoumi Shinshin Nanda ga......

altTitles.ja: 非オタの彼女が俺の持ってるエロゲに興味津々なんだが……

altTitles.en: Non-Otaku She is Curious About the Eroge I Have Somehow...

altTitles.zh: 非宅女友竟然对我的18X游戏兴趣满满

altTitles.ru: Мне любопытно, почему у моей девушки такая страсть к эроге...

description.en: Kazuma, a highschool student who loves eroge, has been confessed to by the honour student and beautiful girl, Misaki Honoka, who's the school's prodigy. What's more, Honoka had declared that she would try her best to become a "heroine" that Kazuma likes?! "Can you… train me?" What kind of eroge is this?
description.ja: エロゲ好きの隠れオタ高校生・一真が、美少女優等生の水崎萌香から突然告白された！　おまけに萌香は一真好みの“ヒロイン”になるために頑張ると宣言、一緒にエロゲをすることに……ってどうしてこうなった!?
description.pt: Kazuma, um estudante do ensino médio que adora eroges, recebeu uma confissão da estudante de honra e garota mais linda da escola, Misaki Honoka, que é a prodígio da escola. Além disso, Honoka declarou que fará o melhor possível para se tornar uma “heroína” que Kazuma goste. “Você poderia… me treinar?” Que tipo de eroge é esse?

altTitles.ja: 二度と自撮り送ってやんない！

altTitles.en: I'll never send a selfie again!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Mi amigo de la infancia no deja de pedirme una selfie para usarlo como referencia para su dibujo, ¿Qué hago?

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en:
In Arboral Year 1294, the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires, remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge, nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician, a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed, and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument, Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!

Left for dead after a battle, Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires, and Luca learns that his powers, rather than being an escape from the battlefield, now force him to be a muse of massacre.
description.fr:
Transcender le fracas des armes, décider du sort de la bataille !
Luka, orphelin recueilli par le chef d'un groupe de mercenaires, n'est pas comme les autres : une branche pousse sur son crâne et il peut voir les sons, matérialisés par des traits de lumière... Le seul à lui parler sans crainte est son père adoptif, aussi fin stratège qu'impitoyable au combat. À 14 ans, Luka a déjà vu assez d'horreurs pour une vie. En tant que clairon, il est de tous les affrontements, transmettant les ordres via son instrument. En réalité, il n'a qu'une envie : échapper à ce quotidien fait de violence pour devenir musicien...


Seulement, la bataille qui s'annonce pourrait être sa dernière : cette fois, il doit prendre les armes... et, surtout, parmi ses opposants se trouvent d'autres "branchus' dotés de divers pouvoirs surnaturels ! Ils font un massacre dans les rangs de Luka, et ce dernier, blessé, se saisit d'un clairon pour sonner la retraite... C'est alors que son véritable pouvoir se dévoile : tous ses alliés visualisent le son de son instrument et ses indications résonnent comme des ordres dans la tête des soldats de son camp ! Le garçon les sauve grâce aux stratégies de son père adoptif.


Témoins de son exploit, les énigmatiques adversaires s'emparent de lui. Luka s'éveille dans une ville entourant une tour immense, vestige des temps anciens et source de magie... Ses nouveaux compagnons sont les protecteurs du lieu, régi par un mystérieux pape. Celui-ci passe un accord avec Luka : si le garçon met son pouvoir et son don tactique à son service, il l'aidera à devenir musicien. Sans le savoir, le jeune prodige se retrouve embarqué dans une guerre dont les enjeux le dépassent !


La lumière du son, seul espoir dans l'horreur des batailles... D'un trait vif et nerveux, une nouvelle génération d'auteurs invente un monde de dark fantasy sans concession. Mais ici, pas de héros surdoué au combat, juste un garçon rêvant de musique... Et pourtant, de ses talents dépend l'issue du conflit !
description.ja: 樹木暦1294年。音が“見える”ラッパ手の少年・リュカは傭兵団に属しながらも戦争を嫌い、楽師になる事を夢見ていた。しかしある日、「枝憑き」と呼ばれる力が発現し、彼の運命は大きく動き出す――。

altTitles.ja: 僕のカノジョ先生

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái tôi là cô giáo

description.en: Can sensei be the heroine? Please?    Due to a traumatic experience, I have a distrust of people called "sensei". I, Saigi Makoto, was called by after school by the most popular and beautiful teacher at my school, Fujiki Maka-sensei. "I... love you" Eh– a confession out of the blue!? "Until you say you love me, I will continue to pursue you." Ever since then, I've been called by for "guidance counselling" after school, somehow watched AV together, being given excessive skin-ship, went on dates together. Over time, I gradually became conscious of Sensei...? But isn't it bad for Sensei to go out with her student? Lesson start!
description.ja: 過去のトラウマが原因で“先生”と呼ばれる人が嫌いな彩木慎は、校内一の美人教師・藤城真香に呼び出される。二人きりの生徒指導室、神妙な面持ちの先生が発したのは「わたしは、君が好きです」まさかの告白で…!?
description.pt-br: Devido a uma experiência traumática, eu nunca mais confiei em pessoas com o título de “professor”. Certo dia eu, Saigi Makoto, fui chamado depois da aula pela professora mais bela de toda a escola, Fujiki Maka-sensei, para de repente ela se confessar do nada e falar que continuará me perseguindo até eu disser que sim!

altTitles.ja: ノゾ×キミ
ノゾミとキミオ

description.en:
Suga Kimio finds himself hiding in the girls locker room, unable to move or escape the situation as the girls in his school crowd in. Although he originally had no ulterior motives, he found himself panicking as he heard the girls coming in and hid in a locker. Komine Nozomi, one of the shy girls in his class finds him, but surprisingly covers for him. Perplexed but glad, Kimio goes home.  
  
Later that night, he gets a text from Nozomi who happens to live across the way on the same floor of the complex they both live in. She blackmails him into agreeing to show each other’s bodies when she texts him. Kimio has to abide by Nozomi’s insane demands or risk ruining his school life so they both start their little peep show through each other’s windows…  
  
Nozo x Kimi: 2-nensei-hen is the second season of the series, but continues the chapter count from the previous magazine.  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16241)

altTitles.ja: 幼なじみが過保護すぎてツライ

description.en: Hina has one-sided feelings for her childhood friend, Yakumo. However, Yakumo is actually like a helicopter parent, an overprotective mama…! "I'm happy about being doted on by the person I like, but being treated like a daughter is the worst!" Wanting to become lovers with Yakumo, Hina tries her hardest to make him look at her as a woman, but…?! The romcom between a determined maiden in love and an overly-protective boy starts now!
description.ja: ヒナは一つ年上の幼なじみ・八雲に片思い中。だけど八雲は、ヒナ限定でとても過保護なママ属性男子だった…！　「好きな人からの溺愛は嬉しい…けど、娘扱いはイヤ！」八雲と恋人同士になりたいヒナは、彼を振り向かせようと頑張るけれど…!?　一途片思い女子 vs ママ属性過保護男子　拗らせまくりのラブコメディ、ここに開幕！
description.pt-br: Hina tem sentimentos unilaterais por seu amigo de infância, Yakumo. No entanto, Yakumo é na verdade como um pai de helicóptero, uma mãe superprotetora...! "Estou feliz por ser amada pela pessoa de quem gosto, mas ser tratada como uma filha é o pior!" Querendo se tornar uma amante de Yakumo, Hina se esforça ao máximo para que ele a veja como uma mulher, mas...!?A comédia romântica entre uma determinada donzela apaixonada e um garoto excessivamente protetor começa agora!

description.en:
The world’s greatest chef. First, second, third… and sixth life. The combined time I’ve spent on cooking is over 100 years.

“I can’t do this anymore.” There is only one way to stop this endless reincarnation and regression. This time, I will definitely succeed.

<100-Year-Old Top Chef>

altTitles.ja: あかねまつり

description.en:
They are friends but not just friends.
This is a 4-koma manga about high school girls who just live their daily lives.

Akane: Short bob with black hair. She lives to enjoy life.
Matsuri: Cool blonde hair, serious at heart.
Azuki: Cute and petite dark girl.
Momiji: A sensible person who always quietly watches over everyone.

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ja: 覗いてはいけない、だから、覗きたい。　この先輩は…女性？　男性？　中性？　魔性??　好奇心という不治の病を患う転校生が出会ったのは、美しく、可愛らしく、格好よく、恐ろしい、謎の存在（ヒト）だった。
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

description.en:
Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

altTitles.ja: とある暗部の少女共棲

description.en:
In Academy City, where esper abilities have been recognized as a general science. Behind the peace, there is a dark side organization that undertakes missions that cannot be made public.

"Item" is an elite unit consisting of four girls. Takitsubo Rikou is able to read and track the weak power emitted by those with abilities. Frenda Seivelun, who excels in combat using explosives and traps. Kinuhata Saiai, who can manipulate nitrogen at will and plays a defensive role. And one of the 7 espers that Academy City is proud of: Mugino Shizuri. They live freely in the darkness of the Academy City, and quietly set their sights on their target...!

This is a story of encounter, friendship, and darkness that eventually leads to a 'terrible incident'!

altTitles.en: Grey Wings of the Old Home

altTitles.ja: 灰羽連盟

description.en:
The series follows a young girl named Rakka, a newly arrived haibane (an angelic-looking being), and other characters in the city of Glie (guri), a walled city with one entrance where no one is allowed to leave.  
Also contains a side story written after the end of the anime. It shows the relation between Reki and Nemu (and Hyouko) after the departure of Kuramori. The colour illustrations are those supposedly by Reki. One is a scenery in her dream and the other is the portrait of Kuramori.  
  
Artbook: Haibane Renmei - Guri no Machi, Haibane no Niwade.

The hottest and most popular model on SNS these days, Choi Bom. Born with a good-looking appearance, he accidentally became a trend, posting a job offer for a housekeeper on his SNS. And after a while, a man comes to visit saying that he will work as a housekeeper... His best friend and first love, who disappeared 7 years ago ...

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

altTitles.ja: 地雷なんですか？地原さん

altTitles.en: That Girl Is Cute… But Dangerous?

altTitles.pt-br: Aquela Garota é Bonita, Mas Perigosa?

description.en: The girl sitting next to me at the start of the new semester is the rumored "landmine" girl... but... is Chihara-san really the "landmine" that everyone says she is?
description.ja: 天然でポンコツで地雷系──!?新学期ボクの隣の席は噂の地雷系、地原 舞。どことなく危険な雰囲気を醸し出してるけど、話してみるとなんだかイメージと違ってて…？
description.pt-br: A garota sentada ao meu lado no começo do novo semestre é a famosa Garota Perigosa, mas… a Chihara-san é mesmo o “Perigo” que todos dizem ser?

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind. When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」

日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.vi: Thời hiện đại trong câu chuyện này là thời đại của "đa dạng" giống loài, những chủng tộc bán nhân có một tên gọi mới là"Genjin" và sống cùng nền văn minh con người. Yukata Shinsou, 1 học sinh năm nhất cao trung bình thường quyết dịnh nhập học vào một ngôi trường tư thục có tỉ lệ Genjin cao nhất nước để tránh mặt những người bạn sơ trung của mình. Và rồi cậu gặp được Tsumiki Ogami, một cô nàng Genjin dạng người sói, và cô ấy sẽ dẫn cậu tận hưởng cuộc sống cao trung đầy màu sắc!
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

altTitles.es-la: El camino a casa después de la escuela

altTitles.ja: 放課後帰宅びより

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

altTitles.vi: Câu lạc bộ siêu cấp về nhà

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.tl: Inimbitahan si Shun sa Klab ng Uwian ni Naoki Satou, na kilala rin bilang "Chokki-chan". Kahit na tumanggi siya, napasama pa rin siya sa mga gawain ng klab sa medyo pilit na paraan! Isang romantikong komedya tungkol sa Klab ng Uwian na tampok ang isang hayskul na dalaga na mahilig maglibot at isang bagong estudyante sa hayskul na nawalan ng pangarap.
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.
description.pt-br: Shun foi convidado para o Clube vá-para casa por Naoki Satou, também conhecido como "Chokki-chan". Apesar de recusar, ele acaba se envolvendo de alguma forma nas atividades do clube! Uma comédia romântica do Clube vá-para casa apresentando uma colegial amante de desvios e um novo aluno do ensino médio que perdeu seu sonho.

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Nameless Battlefield

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam - Na mo Naki Senjou

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム 名も無き戦場

description.en: Master Kazuhisa Kondo comicalizes the world of the popular online game "Gundam Online". Prominent MS fight freely on the ground and in space with Kondo's hands!

altTitles.ja: 百瀬アキラの初恋破綻中。

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love is Coming Apart.

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés du premier amour de Momose Akira.

altTitles.pt-br: O Primeiro Amor de Momose Akira em Ruínas

altTitles.ru: Первая любовь Акиры Момосе терпит крах.

altTitles.es: El primer amor de Momose Akira se derrumba.

altTitles.vi: Mối Tình Đầu Của Akira Momose Đang Trên Bờ Vực Đổ Vỡ
Mối tình đầu đầy trắc trở của Momose Akira

description.en: Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire. Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach. And there was a "fate" that was more than he could have imagined.
description.es:
Kugayama Hajime, un chico que vive en el campo, se reencuentra con su antigua compañera de clase Momose Akira, a la que solía admirar.

Justo cuando está a punto de observarla desde lejos y disfrutar de su agridulce juventud, Akira se acerca de forma inesperada.

Y el "destino" es mucho más de lo que él pudo haberse imaginado.
description.fr: Kugayama Hajime, un garçon vivant à la campagne, revient vers son ancien camarade de classe Momose Akira, qu'il avait l'habitude d'admirer.Alors qu'il s'apprête à la regarder de loin et à profiter de sa jeunesse aigre-douce, Akira fait une approche inattendue.Et il y a eu un « destin » qui a été plus que ce qu'il aurait pu imaginer.
description.ja: ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。
description.pl: Kugayama Hajime, chłopiec mieszkający na wsi, spotyka swoją dawną koleżankę z klasy, Momose Akiry, którą podziwiał. Gdy tylko zamierza obserwować ją z daleka i cieszyć się swoją słodko-gorzką młodością, Akira niespodziewanie zbliża się do niego. A za tym kryło się „przeznaczenie”, którego nie mógł sobie nawet wyobrazić.
description.ru: Жизнь Хадзимэ Кугаямы, мальчишки из глухой деревушки, круто меняется, когда в его жизнь возвращается бывшая одноклассница и когда-то недосягаемая мечта — Акира Момосэ. Он планировал просто наблюдать за ней издалека и наслаждаться воспоминаниями о своей юности... Но неожиданно Акира делает первый шаг навстречу. И вот тут начинается нечто гораздо большее, чем он мог себе представить. Следите за их историей и согревайте свои сердца вместе с ними.
description.tr: Taşrada yaşayan bir çocuk olan Kugayama Hajime’nin, eskiden hayranlık duyduğu sınıf arkadaşı Momose Akira geri döner. Tam onu uzaktan izleyip tatlı ekşi gençliğinin tadını çıkarmak üzereyken, Akira beklenmedik bir yaklaşımda bulunur. Ve hayal edebileceğinden de öte bir “kader” ile karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: Kugayama Hajime é um jovem que vive no interior. Sua vida muda quando Momose Akira, uma antiga colega de escola por quem ele sempre foi apaixonado, retorna à cidade. Hajime planejava admirá-la de longe, saboreando um romance juvenil agridoce. Mas, para sua surpresa, Akira toma a iniciativa de se aproximar. O que se desenrola a partir daí é um destino mais surpreendente do que ele jamais poderia ter imaginado.

altTitles.ja: CLANNAD 脂肪遊戯
CLANNAD ヒメタルオモイ

altTitles.en: “I’m dead even with a single glance of your gaze." (Fever)

description.en:
'Yeah, well done. Don't let other people touch you.'

"Myungha is a young man abandoned by his family and lives alone in the mountains to protect the tombs of his ancestors. One day, his father tells him that he will recognize him as his legitimate son in exchange for fulfilling a simple errand. However, that errand is to marry Prince Howon and live in his house. Thank goodness the prince treats him kindly, but at night, he behaves like someone else. What will this strange marriage bring him."

---

- [Original Webtoon <R15>](https://ridibooks.com/books/297043635)
description.ko:
"그래, 잘 했어. 남이 함부로 만지게 하지 마."

집안에서 내쳐져 무덤지기로 외롭게 살아오던 명하. 어느 날 그는 자신의 아버지에게 특별한 '심부름'을 명 받는다. 그저 심부름일 줄만 알았는데 도착한 곳은 무려 대군의 저택. 그는 하루아침에 무덤지기에서 호원 대군 이사훤의 부인이 된다. 낯선 곳에서 홀로된 명하의 유일한 온기는 사훤의 다정함뿐. 그러나 그 다정함에 기대기엔 밤의 사훤은 너무나도 다른 사람인데…

---

- [Original Webtoon <R15>](https://ridibooks.com/books/297043635)

title.en: Why I Quit Being the Demon King

altTitles.id: Alasan Mengapa Aku Berhenti Jadi Raja Iblis

description.en:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?

title.en: Outaishi-sama, Watashi Kondo Koso Anata ni Korosaretakunain desu!

altTitles.ja: 王太子様、私今度こそあなたに殺されたくないんです〜聖女に嵌められた貧乏令嬢、二度目は串刺し回避します！〜

altTitles.en: You Won't Kill Me This Time, Crown Prince!

altTitles.zh-hk: 王太子大人，这次我绝不想被你杀掉！

description.en: The poverty-stricken noblewoman, Liesel, was murdered by her lover, the crown prince, in an elaborate ruse set up by the evil saintess. However, she receives a second chance to live as she suddenly wakes up as her childhood self. She takes this event as a chance to change her life, and live without ties to both the crown prince and the saintess, but by a strange twist of fate, she becomes entangled with the saintess's childhood friend! A woman with a strong will to live who has been ensnared by fateーLiesel's success story begins here!

altTitles.ja: スマザー・ミー

description.en: In the oppressive city of Detroit, Akio is sold by his dad and becomes an assassin known as Snake. Day after day, he simply follows orders. But suddenly, he meets a blind girl and finds new meaning in life…!
description.vi: Detroit là thành phố nơi người lớn thống trị mọi thứ. Akio bị bán, trở thành sát thủ với tên gọi là Rắn. Cuộc sống hàng ngày của cậu chỉ là tuân theo mệnh lệnh. Một ngày, cậu gặp một cô gái mù và dần dần tìm ra ý nghĩa mới của cuộc sống...

title.en: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess

altTitles.ja: ゼルダの伝説 トワイライトプリンセス

altTitles.pt-br: A Lenda de Zelda: Princesa do Crepúsculo

description.en:
A manga adaption of the original video game.

Link, a shepherd from Ordon Village, sees village children, including with his childhood friend Ilia, being kidnapped by monsters. He chases after them only to find his world covered in twilight. Thereupon Link suddenly transforms into a wolf and finds a mysterious character named Midna. His journey to bring back light into the world begins.
description.pt-br: Link, um pastor da vila Ordon, vê crianças da aldeia, inclusive com seu amigo de infância Ilia, sendo sequestrada por monstros. Ele os persegue apenas para descobrir seu mundo coberto por um crepúsculo. Então Link de repente se transforma em um lobo e encontra um ser misterioso chamada Midna. Sua jornada para trazer de volta luz para o mundo começa.

altTitles.ja: 大人になれない僕らは

altTitles.es-la: Nosotros que no podemos convertirnos en adultos

description.en:
The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"!

(Source: Young Magazine)
description.es-la: ¡El último trabajo de Jo Fujita en Commuting Student Diary! Esta es nuestra tonta e interminable historia de cómo matamos el tiempo una y otra vez el 7 de julio. ¡Una historia de amor en bucle temporal de dos estudiantes de preparatoria atrapados en una "eterna juventud"!

title.en: Breaking Into The Body of The Emperor's Daughter

description.en:
After transmigrating to another world as a wealthy young master, Su Changqing only wanted to live a low-profile life as a rich second-generation heir and enjoy his days in comfort. However, his plans are suddenly disrupted when his family faces an unexpected crisis, and he accidentally discovers the Emperor's secret - that she is actually a woman.

While he initially feared the female Emperor would stop at nothing to silence him, to his surprise, she instead becomes interested in his mysterious ability to transform his appearance. She wants him to become her male body double. What Su Changqing never expected was that being the female Emperor's male substitute would mean he has to visit the imperial harem on his very first day. His peaceful life completely falls apart from that moment on...

title.en: Urareta Henkyou Haku Reijou wa Ringoku no Outaishi ni Dekiai Sareru

altTitles.ja: 売られた辺境伯令嬢は隣国の王太子に溺愛される

altTitles.en: The Young Lady of a District Count Is Sold and Forced to Dote on the Crown Prince of the Neighbouring Country
The Young Lady of a District Count Is Sold and Forced to Dote on the Crown Prince of the Neighboring Country

altTitles.zh: 被卖掉的的边境伯爵大小姐却被邻国王太子所溺爱

altTitles.zh-hk: 被賣掉的的邊境伯爵大小姐卻被鄰國王太子所溺愛

description.en:
"What a boring world this is."

A noble society where it is common sense for women to marry a nobleman from a good family and dote on their husband for the rest of their lives. Anna, the young daughter of the Harmich family, has grown tired of such a world. Rather than having fantasies of marriage, Anna, who is obsessed with the art of war, dreamt of appearing on the battlefield alongside her father. However, after being invaded by their neighbouring country, Albion, Anna's father departed for the battlefield for his last and final time. On top of that, the eldest son was taken as a war prisoner. In dire straits, the Harmich family decides to offer their second daughter, Anna, to the neighbouring country!

altTitles.es-la: La Espada de la Inquisición Celestial

description.en:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

title.en: Shinmai Necromancer, Maou wo Sosei suru

altTitles.en: The Novice Necromancer Who Resurrected the Demon King

altTitles.ja: 新米ネクロマンサー、魔王を蘇生する。

altTitles.id: Nekromanser Pemula yang Membangkitkan Raja Iblis

description.en:
"O spirit destined to be mine, rise once more from the realm of the dead!"

In the depths of an extravagant tomb, Alice, a novice necromancer, channeled her mana into an ancient coffin as she cast her spell. Dust scattered through the air, and a wave of overwhelming mana surged, leaving her breathless. But what emerged was not the mindless undead she had expected—it was a handsome young man, casually perched atop the coffin, his piercing gaze meeting hers.

With a bright, disarming smile, he introduced himself—but Alice soon realized the truth: this was no ordinary man. He was the legendary figure who, centuries ago, had plunged the world into chaos and terror... the Demon King himself.

altTitles.th: อ่านชะตาวันสิ้นโลก

altTitles.ja: 全知的な読者の視点から

altTitles.vi: Góc nhìn của Độc giả Toàn tri

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.en:
During the wedding of the famous actress, Jing Xiu, Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.

Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time, two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears to never lose her again...

title.en: Zombie Sekai de Harem wo Tsukurou!

altTitles.ja: ゾンビ世界でハーレムをつくろう!

description.en: The world is on the brink of collapse due to the zombie threat. Meanwhile, I’m living the most thrilling and tantalizing days of my life! A high school boy who loves shogi and gaming discovers a mysterious power he possesses for the first time in this zombie-infested world.
description.ja: 世界は今、ゾンビの脅威で滅びかけている。俺は今、サイコーにエチエチな日々を過ごしている――。将棋とゲームが大好きなオタクな男子高校生が、ゾンビの世界になって初めて自分が持つ”ある力”を知った。

title.en: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru @comic

altTitles.en: My Youth Romantic Comedy Is Wrong, As I Expected @ comic

altTitles.ru: Как и ожидал, моя школьная романтическая жизнь не удалась @комикс

altTitles.th: กะแล้วชีวิตรักวัยรุ่นของผมมันต้องไม่สดใสเลยซักนิด

altTitles.ja: やはり俺の青春ラブコメはまちがっている。@comic

altTitles.vi: Chuyện tình thanh xuân bi hài của tôi quả nhiên là sai lầm @comic

description.en: Hachiman Hikigaya is a cynic. He believes "youth" is a crock-a sucker's game, an illusion woven from failure and hypocrisy. Unsurprisingly, he's not the most popular guy. Meanwhile, there's Yukino Yukinoshita - brilliant, beautiful, and chillier than winter in Antarctica. Would you believe she's not exactly beloved by her classmates either? The unlikely pair gets forced into a club dedicated to helping solve their fellow students' problems. But will an ice queen and a screw-up really be able to help anybody?
description.ru:
Эта история о школьнике по имени Хачиман Хикигая, который обладает искаженными взглядами на жизнь. У него нет ни друзей, ни подруг, а на вопрос о том, какая у него мечта, можно услышать лишь: «Ее нет». Но не все безразличны к апатии Хачимана. Его учительница просит школьника стать волонтером сервис-клуба, в котором также находится самая красивая девушка школы. Как изменит членство в клубе жизнь Хачимана? Появится ли теперь у него мечта?  
  
Одна из двух манга-адаптаций ранобэ Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru.

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

altTitles.ja: 詭秘の主

description.en:
With the rising tide of steam power and machinery, who can come close to being a Beyonder? Shrouded in the fog of history and darkness, who or what is the lurking evil that murmurs into our ears?  
  
Waking up to be faced with a string of mysteries, Zhou Mingrui finds himself reincarnated as Klein Moretti in an alternate Victorian era world where he sees a world filled with machinery, cannons, dreadnoughts, airships, difference machines, as well as Potions, Divination, Hexes, Tarot Cards, Sealed Artifacts…  
  
The Light continues to shine but mystery has never gone far. Follow Klein as he finds himself entangled with the Churches of the world—both orthodox and unorthodox—while he slowly develops newfound powers thanks to the Beyonder potions.  
  
Like the corresponding tarot card, The Fool, which is numbered 0—a number of unlimited potential—this is the legend of "The Fool."
description.ru: После переселения в мир пара и машин, главный герой Клейн Моретти все больше запутывается в своем путешествии по этому странному сверхъестественному миру, желая найти путь назад. В процессе изучения магической медицины, гадания, запечатанных предметов, всего сверхъестесственного и отбиваясь от всякой чертовщины, он случайно создал легенду о "Шуте"!

title.en: Gate 0: Jieitai Ginzai Nite Kaku Tatakaeri

altTitles.ja: ゲート０ -zero-　自衛隊　銀座にて、斯く戦えり

altTitles.en: Gate 0 -ZERO- The Self-Defense Forces fought like this in Ginza

altTitles.ru: Врата 0: Сражение Сил самообороны в Гинзе.

description.en: In the summer of 20XX, a "gate to another world"' suddenly appeared in Ginza, Tokyo. What came pouring in from inside was a mysterious army and a group of hideous monsters. They go around slaughtering people, and Ginza in broad daylight quickly turns into a hellscape. While everyone was helplessly thrown into confusion in this state of emergency, there was one man who was brave enough to move around. That man was Yohji Itami, an otaku Self-Defense Force officer who would later be called the "Hero of Nijubashi"!
description.ja: 20××年の夏、東京銀座に突如「異世界への門」が出現した。中から雪崩れ込んできたのは、謎の軍勢と醜悪な怪異の群れ。彼らは人々を殺戮して回り、白昼の銀座はたちまち地獄絵図と化した。この非常事態に誰もがなすすべなく混乱に陥る中、ひとりだけ果敢に動き回る男がいた。その男こそのちに「二重橋の英雄」と呼ばれることとなる、オタク自衛官の伊丹耀司だった――！
description.ru: Летом 20ХХ года в Гинзе, квартале Токио, внезапно появились «Врата в иной мир». Из них разразились таинственная армия и полчища диковинных уродливых монстров. Они нахлынули и устроили бойню, и Гинза средь бела дня мгновенно обратилась адом. И пока в панике все растерянно метались посреди этой чрезвычайной ситуации, лишь одному мужчине хватило храбрости действовать. Им оказался Итами Йоджи, отаку из Сил самообороны, которого впоследствии назовут «Героем Нидзюбаси»! Безумно популярная серия фэнтези «Другой мир против Сил самообороны», история появления врат, «Инцидент в Гинзе», теперь в формате манги!!!

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

altTitles.vi: Giết Chết Nam Chính, Ta Trở Thành Nữ Ma Đầu.

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.ru: Пробравшись на невольничий корабль, Юлиан отправляется на континент вместе с сотней рабов, жаждущих свободы... Но что ждёт его впереди?!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

altTitles.ja: 血の姫と騎士

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck… 

---

altTitles.ja: 選択のトキ

description.en: During summer break, a junior high school student Mitsuharu collides with an unusual creature while speeding on his bicycle. That unusual creature was a genderless alien called Toki who came to Earth for a "purpose". An unpredictable story about a lonely human and an alien starts!

In the world where the sea level has risen, the sea has already covered the continent.   
In the world where the land can not be found anymore, the family of the boy, 'Bota', lives in a small boat and wanders around.   
  
I am looking for another 'man' somewhere and I am safe in the rules that my father has set.
description.vi: Trong một thế giới nơi mực nước biển đã dâng cao và đại dương đã bao phủ toàn bộ lục địa, đất liền không còn tồn tại nữa. Gia đình của cậu bé tên Bota sống trên một con thuyền nhỏ và lang thang khắp nơi. Tôi đang tìm kiếm một "người" nào đó ở đâu đó và an toàn trong những quy tắc mà cha tôi đã đặt ra.
description.pt-br: O mundo foi submerso e monstros marinhos governam a terra. Será que Bota e sua família irão conseguir escapar desse inferno marítimo? E quem diabos é Kana...?!

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ja: よぅ、アクアリスト

description.en: A delinquent boy was out at a festival when he finds a discarded goldfish. Recalling his childhood experience of buying a goldfish from a festival stall and bringing it home only to have it die, he tries to make up for it by releasing the goldfish into the river. However, a mysterious girl stops him and tells him that it is not allowed to let out goldfish into the wild, and he learns how to keep goldfish at home and becomes a proper "aquarist."
description.ja: 見た目は派手だが根は優しいテツオは祭の最中、ゴミ箱に無造作に捨てられている金魚を拾う。川に逃がそうとしたその時、謎の和服美少女・カナデがその行為にまったをかける――！アクアリストのカナデと出会い、テツオは金魚を飼うことを決意する。だが、思っていたよりも金魚を飼うことは大変で――!?
description.ru: Тэцуо — парень с вызывающей внешностью, но очень добрым сердцем. Однажды он попал на фестиваль, где находит выброшенных золотых рыбок. Когда же Тэцуо собрался выпустить их в реку, он замечает девушку...
description.es-la: Tetsuo un chico bastante llamativo, pero que en el fondo es alguien amable, recoge unos peces dorados que fueron tirados a la basura durante un festival; mientras intentaba liberarlos en el rio... ¿¡Se encontró con una solitaria y hermosa chica!?
